about_the_game:
This is a platform action adventure 2D pixel game.

Gameplay 1: The game is an action adventure that requires challenging each level one by one. If the challenge is successful, the player will enter the next level. If the player dies, they will start over from the first level.

Gameplay 2: In the game, you can collect points by fighting monsters and using props. When the level challenge is successful, there will be a large number of point rewards, and the points will be added to the leaderboard to challenge the first place! Points are also one of the conditions for opening hidden levels.

Gameplay 3: The game uses a timing system to start counting at the beginning of each level. The shorter the time it takes to successfully challenge a level, the more points it will earn.

Gameplay 4: The game adds hidden levels. When you collect all designated items in the game and earn enough points, the hidden level will be triggered when you pass. If you do not collect all items, the hidden level will not be triggered.

Gameplay 5: Skills have been added to the game, allowing players to collect skills during level exploration. With these skills, your adventure will be more enjoyable, and the addition of the Tree of Life will make it easier to challenge levels with less effort.

name: Red Guest Biography

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: i5-12400
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX580 rx590 8G
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A platform adventure 2D pixel game that includes melee attacks, ranged attacks, skill systems, point systems, and timing systems.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean
